hold_handle.description: Hold the handle firmly for smooth operation of the dispenser.

clean_handle_meticulously.description: Clean the handle thoroughly to ensure cleanliness.

rotate_handle_clockwise.description: Rotate the handle in clockwise direction to dispense the content.

rotate_handle_to_dispense.description: Rotate the handle in order to dispense the content.

clean_handle.description: Clean the handle for good hygiene.

rotate_handle_back.description: Rotate the handle back to its original position after dispensing.

rotate_handle.description: Rotate the handle to pour out the content.

press_handle.description: Press the handle to start the dispenser.

press_then_rotate_handle.description: Press and then rotate the handle to pour out the content.

rotate_then_press_handle.description: Rotate and then press the handle to start the dispenser.

unseal_lid.description: Open the lid to check the quantity of the content inside the dispenser.

seal_lid.description: Close the lid securely to prevent the content from spilling out.

clean_lid_thoroughly.description: Clean the lid thoroughly to maintain hygiene.

uncap_lid_to_refill.description: Open the lid to refill the dispenser.

cap_lid_after_refill.description: Close the lid to prevent spillage after refilling the dispenser.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid to maintain hygiene.

secure_lid.description: Secure the lid to prevent spillage after refilling the dispenser.

remove_lid.description: Remove the lid to refill the dispenser.

open_lid.description: Open the lid to refill the dispenser.

close_lid.description: Close the lid after refilling the dispenser.

open_then_close_lid.description: Open and then close the lid in case it needed to be used.

close_then_open_lid.description: Close and then open the lid during maintenance checks.

clean_dispenser_surface.description: Clean the surface of the dispenser to keep it clean and shiny.

clean_dispenser_body_for_hygiene.description: Clean the dispenser body to maintain hygiene.

wipe_dispenser_bottom.description: Clean the bottom of the dispenser to prevent it from slipping.

clean_dispenser_body.description: Clean the dispenser body to keep it hygienic.

clean_dispenser.description: Clean the dispenser body thoroughly to ensure cleanliness and hygiene.

prepare_dispenser.description: Prepare the dispenser for use by opening the lid and holding the handle.

clean_dispenser_completely.description: Clean the entire dispenser including handle, lid, and body to maintain good hygiene.

clean_entire_dispenser.description: Clean the whole dispenser including handle, lid, and body for good hygiene.

prep_for_dispensing.description: Prepare for dispensing by uncapping the lid and rotating the handle.

clean_dispenser_handle_and_lid.description: Wipe the lid and handle of the dispenser to keep it clean.

prepare_to_dispense.description: Prepare the dispenser by rotating the handle and opening the lid.

clean_whole_dispenser.description: Clean the entire dispenser to keep it hygienic.

clean_all_parts.description: Clean each part of the dispenser to ensure overall hygiene and cleanliness.

operate_dispenser.description: Operate the dispenser by pressing and rotating the handle and opening and closing the lid.
